question: If you were denied Medicaid or Family Access to Medical Insurance Security Plan (FAMIS) coverage outside Open Enrollment after you applied during Open Enrollment
text:
If you were denied Medicaid or Family Access to Medical Insurance Security Plan (FAMIS) coverage outside Open Enrollment after you applied during Open Enrollment
          
        
(Desplazarse hacia abajo para ver Preguntas Ms Frecuentes en Espaol)
If you are denied eligibility for Medicaid or FAMIS after applying for coverage through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace during Open Enrollment, and the Open Enrollment period has ended, dont worry! A Special Enrollment Period will automatically be opened for you to come back to Virginia's Insurance Marketplace to enroll in coverage. Just log into your Virginia's Insurance Marketplace account and continue to select the right health coverage for your needs and budget.

Please note:
Customers must enroll in plan within 60 days of their Medicaid/FAMIS denial.
Coverage will become effective once you have paid your first months premium.

Need a different start date?
If you originally applied through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace, contact us and request that your coverage start be moved back to the date it would have started if Virginia's Insurance Marketplace had originally determined you eligible for a plan through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace (provided complete premium payment is made for the retroactive period).
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________
Si se le niega la elegibilidad para Medicaid o FAMIs luego de solicitar cobertura a travs de Virginia's Insurance Marketplace durante la inscripcin abierta, y el perodo de inscripcin abierta ha terminado, no se preocupe! Se abrir automticamente un perodo de inscripcin especial para que usted vuelva a Virginia's Insurance Marketplace a inscribirse en una cobertura. Simplemente ingrese en su cuenta de Virginia's Insurance Marketplace y seleccione la cobertura mdica correcta para sus necesidades y presupuesto.

Tenga en cuenta:
Los clientes deben inscribirse en un plan dentro de los 60 das de la denegacin de Medicaid/FAMIS.
La cobertura tendr vigencia a partir de que haya pagado la prima del primer mes.

Necesita una fecha de inicio diferente?
Si originalmente present su solicitud a travs de Virginia's Insurance Marketplace, contctenos y solicite que el inicio de su cobertura se traslade a la fecha en que hubiera comenzado si Virginia's Insurance Marketplace hubiera determinado originalmente que era elegible para un plan de Virginia's Insurance Marketplace (siempre y cuando el pago de la prima se haga para el perodo retroactivo).
